verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_6: On the Day when the Quake quakes.
verse.verse_7: And is followed by the Successor.
verse.verse_8: Hearts on that Day will be pounding.
verse.verse_10: They say, "Are we to be restored to the original condition?
verse.verse_11: When we have become hollow bones?"
verse.verse_12: They say, "This is a losing proposition."
verse.verse_13: But it will be only a single nudge.
verse.verse_15: Has the story of Moses reached you?
verse.verse_16: When His Lord called out to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
verse.verse_18: And say, "Do you care to be cleansed?
verse.verse_19: And I will guide you to your Lord, and you will turn reverent."
verse.verse_20: He showed him the Greatest Miracle.
verse.verse_22: Then turned his back, and tried.
verse.verse_24: He said, "I am your Lord, the most high."
verse.verse_25: So God seized him with an exemplary punishment, in the last and in the first.
verse.verse_26: In this is a lesson for whoever fears.
verse.verse_27: Are you more difficult to create, or the heaven? He constructed it.
verse.verse_28: He raised its masses, and proportioned it.
verse.verse_29: And He dimmed its night, and brought out its daylight.
verse.verse_30: And the earth after that He spread.
verse.verse_31: And from it, He produced its water and its pasture.
verse.verse_33: A source of enjoyment for you and for your animals.
verse.verse_34: But when the Great Cataclysm arrives.
verse.verse_35: A Day when man will remember what he has endeavored.
verse.verse_36: And Hell will be displayed to whoever sees.
verse.verse_37: As for him who was defiant.
verse.verse_38: And preferred the life of this world.
verse.verse_40: But as for him who feared the Standing of his Lord, and restrained the self from desires.
verse.verse_42: They ask you about the Hour, "When will it take place?"
verse.verse_43: You have no knowledge of it.
verse.verse_44: To your Lord is its finality.
verse.verse_45: You are just a warner for whoever dreads it.
verse.verse_46: On the Day when they witness it-as though they only stayed an evening, or its morning.
